div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 597 Caprioara (formerly Kaprevar), c. 48 km. WNW of Deva, Rumania, 1875 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 85 AR. Pot hoard Apollonia, Illyria: dr. Dyrrhachium: dr. Disposition: Timisoara 4; Budapest 4 Milleker, DÃ©lm 1 (1896), pp. 51-2 Mitrea, ED 10 (1945), p. 88
